name: Reckless Warrior
desc:
Reduce this unit's DEF and RES to 0 as combat starts, but add half of this unit's DEF and RES to Avoid before being reduced.
Unit can counter enemies at any range (does not work on Siege weapons).
components: unit2.get_stat('RES') if item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) else unit2.get_stat('DEF')
